attributes.action: remove Carol Ann Duffy from her post as Poet Laureate and replace her with Scroobius Pip (David Meads).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Meads, more commonly known as Scroobius Pip (of Dan Le Sac vs Scroobius Pip fame), is the most talented poet in the country. He should be our Poet Laureate: he would make our country proud. He's more relevant to modern Britain than Carol Ann Duffy.
